__e: Please, give me a minute, I don't know where I'm at.

All right, you have to give me a second, this hasn't exactly been my easiest day.
Give me one good reason why I shouldn't.
Can you think of one reason why we shouldn't do this?
Just give me one reason why not, just one.
Wrong. All wrong. Give me that.
I can be whatever I want to be!
It means "I don't know." Just give it to me.
It's enough as long as you believe in yourself.
Just give me some time to think about that.
Just give me a little more time, please.
Come on, don't be like that. Just give me a hand.
Hey, give me a hand with this stuff, will you? Okay.

I don't give a damn what you say.

- If that's what you want, then give me the key.
